title: Yorktown Battlefield Part of Colonial National Historical Park: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning            Planning       Yorktown Battlefield, a part of Colonial National Historical Park (CNHP), provides the following park documents in fulfillment of the Electronic Freedom of Information Act Amendments of 1996 (EFOIA, 5 USC 552(2))    Yorktown Long Range Interpretive Plan (LRIP) 2008 A Long Range Interpretive Plan (LRIP) provides a 5-10 year vision for Yorktown's interpretive program.
